Content.Content:
[$BOX] [$CELL] [$BLOCK]
Steps Rationale
1. Check the storage container of the reagent sticks. The reagent sticks should be stored in a dark, dry, and airtight container to ensure reliable results.
2. Wear sterile gloves. Prevents transmission of microorganisms.
3. Clean the glans penis with soap and water. Reduces contamination of urine sample.
4. Collect midstream urine. Flushes any contaminating bacteria in the urethra.
5. Immerse the reagent stick into the urine container completely. Ensures accurate results.
6. Hold the reagent stick sideways in a horizontal position. Prevents mixing of different reagents.
[$/BLOCK] [$/CELL] [$/BOX]
Content.Name: PHYSIOLOGICAL INTEGRITY 215
